meanings.sent1: The isonomic treatment of all citizens ensures fairness in the legal system.
meanings.sent2: In a truly isonomic society, everyone is subject to the same rules.
meanings.sent3: The isonomic distribution of candy at the party prevented any arguments.
meanings.sent4: The isonomic nature of the game leveled the playing field for all participants.
meanings.sent5: The concept of isonomic rights is essential for a just society.
